content:
Hi everyone!

I'm wondering if there is an ongoing effort for defining how WASM modules/components are going to be packaged and distributed for server deployments. If so could you please point me to the right direction? Currently I'm looking into build something on top of the OCI spec/infrastructure, but I'm not sure if that is the right direction. I'd love to have a discussion on this matter if there are others looking into this too. Many thanks.
There are people doing wasm with OCI today, so it can be done, but there are also people thinking about a new story centered around the Wasm component model.
